channel.title: Modzone
channel.description:
ive added my mod zone but my mo shop doesnt seem to appear autospawn.cfg
[code]//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption spawn = 546 3381 2727 0 0 0 0 0 1 zaff[/code] added the modzone coord bu it hasnt appeared? also aa tut on safespots cuz its wildy lol
